abilityEffect: Once during your turn, if you drew this Pokémon from your deck at the beginning of your turn and your Bench isn't full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

effect.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Meteor Mash attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
effect.fr: Pendant votre prochain tour, l'attaque Poing Météore de ce Pokémon inflige 100 dégâts supplémentaires (avant application de la Faiblesse et de la Résistance).
effect.de: Während deines nächsten Zuges fügt die Attacke Sternenhieb dieses Pokémon 100 Schadenspunkte mehr zu (bevor Schwäche und Resistenz verrechnet werden).
effect.it: Durante il tuo prossimo turno, l'attacco Meteorpugno di questo Pokémon infligge 100 danni in più, prima di aver applicato debolezza e resistenza.
effect.pt: Durante o seu próximo turno, o ataque Meteoro Esmagador deste Pokémon causará 100 pontos de dano a mais (antes de aplicar Fraqueza e Resistência).
effect.es: Durante tu próximo turno, el ataque Puño Meteoro de este Pokémon hace 100 puntos de daño más (antes de aplicar Debilidad y Resistencia).
